pullRequest.title: MINOR: change the log level from ERROR to DEBUG when failing to get plugin class loader
pullRequest.bodyText:
The connectors located at classpath are loaded by AppClassLoader so Worker fails to find the PluginClassLoader for them. It should be normal case but the log level is ERROR.
there is similar case in DelegatingClassLoader#loadClass, and the log level is TRACE.
Committer Checklist (excluded from commit message)

 Verify design and implementation
 Verify test coverage and CI build status
 Verify documentation (including upgrade notes)

nodes.bodyText: I agree this should not be an error. Would debug be reasonable given the "Getting plugin class loader" message above?

commit.message: MINOR: change the log level from ERROR to TRACE when failing to get plugin loader for connector

afterCommit.message: MINOR: change the log level from ERROR to TRACE when failing to get plugin loader for connector
